questions.text: What are you shopping for today?
How often do you shop with us?

inspiration.preheader: Remember when you first fell in love with Banana Republic? Let's reignite that passion.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A stylish individual confidently walking through a bustling city, wearing a perfectly tailored Banana Republic outfit.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. At Banana Republic, we believe in timeless style and effortless elegance. Let's reconnect and explore how we can help you achieve your fashion goals.

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've achieved so much in your style journey with us.

second.template: You could save {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: Exclusive savings await you on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, let's cherish the moments we've shared.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A cozy, elegant living room with a Banana Republic catalog on the coffee table, symbolizing a long-standing relationship.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared so many stylish moments together. At Banana Republic, we value the trust you've placed in us. Let's continue this journey and explore new ways to enhance your wardrobe.

first.template: Your relationship with us is valued at {{customer.relationship_value}}.
first.fallback: Your relationship with us is invaluable.

second.template: You've enjoyed {{customer.lifetime_value}} in benefits with us.
second.fallback: You've enjoyed numerous benefits with us over the years.

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a community that values timeless elegance and modern sophistication.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant group of stylish individuals at a social event, all wearing Banana Republic outfits, showcasing community and belonging.
social_proof.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. At Banana Republic, we're more than just a brand; we're a community. Let's reconnect and explore how we can help you shine in every occasion.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our style community.
first.fallback: You're a valued member of our style community.

second.fallback: Your engagement with our community is highly appreciated.
